name: Philips SA3CNT16K Connect 3 16GB* WiFi MP3 video player with Android™
description-de_DE-print: GoGear Connect ist das perfekte Gerät für Entertainment unterwegs. Laden Sie zahlreiche Android-Apps und Spiele herunter. Genießen Sie satten Klang über die geräuschisolierenden Kopfhörer dank FullSound und Surround Sound für Filme oder über den leistungsstarken, integrierten Lautsprecher.
description-en_US-print: Philips SA3CNT16K Connect 3 16GB* WiFi MP3 video player with Android™. Display diagonal: 3.2, Aspect ratio: 3:2. Total Harmonic Distortion (THD): 0.05, MP3 bit rates: 8 - 320, WMA bit rates: 5 - 192. Supported radio bands: FM. Bluetooth version: 2.1+EDR. Weight: 0.105
description-fr_FR-print: GoGear Connect est l'équipement de loisirs idéal pour tous vos déplacements. Téléchargez une infinité d'applications et de jeux Android. Grâce à la technologie FullSound et au son Surround pour les films, profitez d'un son d'une richesse exceptionnelle avec le casque à isolation phonique comme sur le puissant haut-parleur intégré.

name: Cisco Wireless-G Business Internet Video Camera w/ Two-Way Audio
description-en_US-print: High-Quality Wireless Video Surveillance Platform Provides Flexible Installation - Wireless box camera with interchangeable lenses and I/O ports that allow flexible installation for multiple applications - High-quality CCD sensor with low-light sensitivity and an IR filter switcher provides optimal video image under a range of conditions - Simultaneous dual codecs provide optimal combination of viewing and storage of video - Two-way audio, IP multicast, 3GPP (3rd Generation Partnership Project), and lots of other advanced features make this solution ideal for surveillance deployments Cisco® Small Business Video Surveillance products provide customizable ways for small business owners to monitor and protect their companies. These high-quality solutions can be optimized for many different applications and sites. Each camera can be quickly mounted using the bracket included in the package. Their compact form factor also enables the cameras to be put inside a protective enclosure for interior or exterior installations. The cameras use removable CS-mount lenses and can be customized with optional zoom, wide-angle, vari-focal, auto-iris, and other types of lenses as required for a specific application or setting. The Cisco WVC2300 Wireless-G Business Internet Video Camera can be mounted on any pan-tilt (PT) base that supports the Pelco D protocol and can be remotely rotated and controlled through an RS-485 interface. It has two input and two output ports, which can be used to connect the camera to an alarm panel, siren, passive infrared (PIR) sensors, smoke detectors, lighting switch (on/off), door sensors, etc. The Cisco WVC2300 uses a high-quality progressive-scan charge-coupled device (CCD) sensor, delivering good-quality video. The CCD sensor also has low-light sensitivity so video can be captured even in environments with very low light or during near-dark times of day. Additionally, the camera incorporates an infrared (IR) cut filter that, when used with a separate IR lamp, allows for video capture in total darkness. The Cisco WVC2300 camera supports dual codecs (MPEG-4 and MJPEG). Both codecs can be used simultaneously. MPEG-4 gives efficient bandwidth consumption with good-quality compression and is optimal for real-time viewing of video. MJPEG gives optimal video quality with lossy compression, making it ideal for large-volume storage to a network attached storage (NAS) device. The Cisco WVC2300's audio capabilities include two-way audio, embedded microphone, external speaker and microphone ports, and voice compression. With extensive feature support, such as IP multicast, Real Time Streaming Protocol (RTSP), Real Time Protocol (RTP), and 3rd Generation Partnership Project (3GPP), it enables video to be viewed from multiple endpoints and client applications such as 3G phones, and QuickTime clients on PCs or Wi-Fi phones. The wireless capabilities of the WVC2300 include support for 1x2 multiple-input, multiple-output (MIMO), providing better range than traditional 802.11g, and strong wireless security utilizing Wi-Fi Protected Access (WPA). Support for multiple network protocols like 802.1p priority, 802.1Q VLANs, and Dynamic DNS (DDNS), make the solution ideal for multiple IP surveillance applications. The cameras can also be managed securely using HTTPS.

name: Samsung UE40ES6900 LED TV
description-en_US-print:
Perfect entertainment with 3D thrills and Smart apps

- Enjoy enhanced Smart Hub content and services
- See vibrantly enhanced colour and detail
- Experience vivid and realistic Full HD entertainment
- Immerse in Samsung’s premium 3D visuals at home

Enjoy easier and more convenient Smart Hub services

Enter a world of online entertainment with the new enhanced Smart Hub. Three new signature services – Fitness, Kids and Family Story - help you to exercise, keep children entertained and educated, and share precious
memories. The powerful Dual Core processor allows you to do smooth multitasking between content. Browse the web, access Samsung Apps and enjoy breathtaking Full HD 3D content at home. Experience 3D content with the 3D explore feature. Discover the ultimate Smart TV experience.
* Content available via Smart Hub may vary among product categories, models, and territories. See Samsung.com for more details.
* Certain apps must be purchased and may not be available in all regions.
* Certain Smart TV features may require firmware upgrades.
* Fitness Service may not be available in all regions.
* Web Browser is not available on all models.

Enjoy apps, videos, Skype, web browsing and more

Discover a new world of social and personalised home entertainment with Samsung’s updated Smart Hub and three great new services. Family Story lets you share special photos, messages and events with loved ones. Meanwhile, children can stay entertained and educated with the Kids feature. You can also exercise and manage your training using Fitness. With access to great content as well as a selection of Samsung Apps, web browsing, Skype and more, this is the ultimate family home entertainment experience.

Discover a new reality in Full HD

Enjoy a greater level of home entertainment realism than ever before. Thanks to a resolution twice as high as standard HD TVs, your Samsung Smart TV delivers a breathtaking viewing experience that takes you beyond the screen into a world of total immersion. When you’ve seen the rich and vivid texture of Full HD images, your favourite TV programmes and movies will never be the same again. Discover reality with a full high definition experience.

More vibrant colours for better images

Using an advanced picture quality improvement algorithm, Samsung’s Wide Colour Enhancer Plus drastically improves the quality of any image and uncovers hidden details. Now see colours as they were meant to be seen with Wide Colour Enhancer Plus.

True 3D experience in a whole new light

The Samsung LED TVs have created an entirely new and immersive viewing experience when it comes to home entertainment. With the latest 3D imaging technology, you will be completely immersed in a new world of TV viewing reality.

Watch movies from your USB

With ConnectShare Movie, simply plug your USB memory drive into the TV and instantaneously enjoy movies, photos or music. Now, you can experience a wide variety of content in the comfort of your living room on your TV.

Stay in closer contact with great widescreen Skype video calls

Stay in touch with friends and family from the comfort of your home thanks to the Skype app for Smart TV, available for free in the Samsung App store. Combined with the separately-sold Skype camera kit, it allows you to make high-quality widescreen video calls to loved ones throughout the world at low rates or even for free. You can create new Skype accounts, access existing ones and navigate using your TV’s remote control. Be closer with face-to-face communication.

Wirelessly access and stream your content

Make the most of all your content and devices with wireless sharing. Thanks to AllShare Play, you can stream movies, photos, music and more from any compatible devices nearby, including PCs. Cloud technology and Samsung web storage give you even greater freedom and mobility, allowing you to access and share multimedia when you’re away from home, too. Now you can enjoy all your favourite content on your TV or away from it.

Access the Internet without wires

With Wireless LAN Built-in, streamline your TV’s connectivity capabilities without adding more external devices and maintain its attractive design.

name: Samsung S24A650S
description-en_US-print: Gentle on the Eyes and on the Environment Save electricity and hassle with Samsung’s Eco light sensor. By adjusting screen brightness to match your surrounding environment, the SA650’s Eco light sensor creates a brilliant visual display while also minimizing your energy consumption. You will benefit from a more comfortable viewing experience that is far better for the environment. Monitor brightness is adjusted to match your ambient light, which ensures that the screen is highly visible and appropriately set for your eyes. So, in a dark room the screen will reduce brightness, but when sitting in a room with plenty of light, it will increase brightness. The Eco light sensor is simply perfect for modern living - helping you conserve energy and keep comfortable. Save Energy with New Smart Motion Technology Step into the future with the SA650 monitor, which utilizes the very latest in motion sensors to create a monitor that hangs on your every movement. With a built-in PIR (Pyrolectric Infrared Ray) sensor, the SA650 automatically detects movement within a specified area in front of the screen. This allows your monitor to automatically dim or power off, and then power back on or brighten once detecting a nearby viewer. Eco motion sensor is the easiest way to conserve energy. A Business Tool That Produces Crystal-Clear Images The Samsung Business Monitor produces the highest level of static contrast ratio of 3000 : 1. Compared to competitive models in the same class, the Samsung Business Monitor possesses a contrast ratio that is three times higher. This provides users with clear and sharp image representation which is a strong benefit for businesses that work heavily around graphics and other high-resolution images. See Your Work from the Best Possible Angle Provide employees with an optimal viewing experience in the office with the reasonably priced Samsung Business Monitor. While conventional monitors have a viewing angle of 170 degrees horizontally, the Samsung monitor has an extra wide viewing angle of 178 degrees. The additional 8 degrees is particularly useful when sharing on-screen information with one or more coworkers or presenting your ideas to clients. The Samsung Business Monitor has improved its vertical viewing angles by 18 degrees, making it the perfect display for giving presentations in front of a large audience or when viewing other content such as a video. A Monitor Designed to Match Business Needs The Samsung LED Business Monitor SA650 has been designed to enhance work conditions and efficiency. Featuring Front Tactile Buttons, the SA650 minimizes costly errors found with high usage, which is a common problem with touch type button monitors. Furthermore, with its smarter design, users can still access these buttons when wall mounted, which can be an issue when monitors feature side panel buttons. Adding to the visual experience, the SA650 features a Narrow Matt Bezel. This reduces distraction around display area and delivers an experience that is immersive and engaging. Conveniently Adjust Monitor Height, Tilt, and Perspective The Samsung LED Business Monitor SA650 has been designed to help boost work efficiency, delivering a tailored experience with its choice of viewer settings. The height-adjustable stand ensures that the screen can always be set at the optimal eye level, which enhances the visual experience while also helping maintain the viewer’s body posture. Other features include the tilt and pivot capabilities, which not only increase comfort levels but also introduce new ways of working. The SA650 Monitor can rotate 90° degrees, allowing for more appropriate view depending on the work. So, now you can take convenience and efficiency to amazing heights with the Samsung LED Business Monitor SA650. Control Power Consumption, Conserve Energy Eco saving makes saving energy easy. It adjusts the brightness of your Samsung monitor based on how much energy you want to save. And with the choice of three energy saving modes (50%, 25% and Power Saving off), you can really tailor your monitor use to meet your own personal needs. Samsung’s commitment to saving energy is designed to help both you and the environment, and with up to 50% saving on consumption, you can really make a positive impact on your eco footprint. Take the effort out of saving energy and take control with Eco saving. Maximize Workspace with the Efficient Handle VESA Wall Mount If you need a work monitor that uses office space efficiently, then Samsung LED Business Monitor SA650 is the perfect choice. From physically moving the monitor with the carrying handle to quickly installing, the SA650 is ready to deliver an efficient and clean work space. The SA650 is also equipped and prepared for you as a VESA Wall mount, providing a multi-screen or wall mounted monitor. Optimizing your office space is now easily achieved with the Samsung LED Business Monitor SA650. Save Energy and See the Results with the Energy Tree Take the guess work out of eco savings with Samsung new Energy Tree feature. For the first time, you can now know exactly how much energy you are saving through your eco modes such as the Eco light sensor and the Eco motion sensor. Through an intuitive energy saving status, which can be displayed either intuitively or graphically, you can keep tabs on your efforts to make the world a better place.

name: Lenovo ThinkVision LT1952P
description-en_US-print: For enterprises that need a green, fully functional display screen, with unparalleled visual quality, the ThinkVision LT1952p is the best choice. Compatible with virtually any hardware platform, the LT1952p offers VGA, DVI-D, and DisplayPort connections. The LT1952p is a breeze to use with exceptional LED performance, swivel, tilt, and lift options, 5 milliseconds response time, and a 1000:1 contrast ratio. The LT1952p delivers high energy cost savings, through compliance with go green certifications. The monitors are mercury-free, contain reduced toxic chemicals. The LT1952p delivers the best value on investment for large enterprises.

name: LG AN-VC300 webcam

Get the LG Skype® Web Camera and keep in touch with family and friends. Features: - built-in microphone; - 30f/s (@VGA); - 2.0 Megapixel; - CMOS.
description-fr_FR-print: Caméra Skype Caméra Skype pour TV LCD séries LW650S LW659S LW570S LW579S LW5500 LW5590 LV570S LV5500 (32’’ et +) / LV5300 / LV375S et TV Plasma série PZ950S. Cette caméra Skype est compatible avec tous les téléviseurs Smart TV 2011. Connectez-vous à Skype et communiquez avec vos proches en toute simplicité !

name: LG E2442T-BN
description-fr_FR-print: Les moniteurs LG de la série E42 font rimer informatique et intelligence. Ces écrans haut de gamme 16/9ème et Full HD intègrent une suite complète de fonctionnalités intuitives. Ainsi, nos écrans informatiques ont la faculté d’ajuster leur luminosité selon l’intensité lumineuse ambiante. Les moniteurs E42 sont également « design » avec une esthétique proche de celle des téléviseurs : tons noirs laqués, lignes élégantes et sobres… Disponibles en 22, 23, 24 pouces et 27 pouces.

name: Fujifilm FinePix Z950EXR
description-de_DE-print: Focus, shoot, search and browse with new touch screen technology Fotos und Videos in hoher Qualität mit dem neuen EXR AUTO-Modus Der 16-Megapixel EXR CMOS-Sensor liefert Bilder in unübertroffener Qualität. Die FINEPIX Z950EXR verhindert Unschärfe durch die Bewegungserkennung und schießt helle, klare Fotos auch bei schlechten Lichtverhältnissen. EXR AUTO mit 99 Aufnahmemustern Die neue EXR AUTO mit Bewegungserkennung erkennt blitzschnell 54 Szenenarten und optimiert automatisch alle Einstellungen von der Belichtung bis zum Weißabgleich und schaltet darüber hinaus in den idealen Sensormodus: HR (hohe Auflösung) für gute Lichtbedingungen, SN (hohe Empfindlichkeit / geringes Rauschen) für schlechte Lichtverhältnisse und DR (Dynamikbereich) für Szenen mit hohem Kontrast. Intelligente Szenenerkennung Der innovative neue EXR AUTO-Modus mit Bewegungserkennung reduziert die Motiv-Unschärfe bei schlechten Lichtverhältnissen nahezu vollständig. Dank der neuen Bewegungserkennung konnten die Aufnahmearten durch die erkannten Szenen und die automatisch optimierten Aufnahmemodi im EXR AUTO-Modus auf 99 Muster erweitert werden. - Easy Web Upload Advanced Detection & Flex Shooting - Motion Panorama 360 - Dog / Cat Detection - Face Recognition
description-en_US-print: Focus, shoot, search and browse with new touch screen technology High Quality Photos & Movies with the New EXR AUTO The 16 megapixel EXR CMOS sensor creates ultimate image quality. The FinePix Z950EXR prevents blur with Motion Detection and captures bright image in dark scene. Powerful zoom Super-high Resolution in a Compact Body Capture superb image with Fujinon Lens. Powerful zoom and high speed function is featured in a compact body. Enjoy Shooting! Enjoy Viewing! This Camera is Packed Full of Fun Features! - Touch Screen Technology enhances Image Serch - Fujifilm Boasts Original Functions for Better Shooting - Easy Web Upload Advanced Detection & Flex Shooting - Motion Panorama 360 - Dog / Cat Detection - Face Recognition

name: Lexmark C762 Colour Laser Printer
description-en_US-print: Outstanding colour and performance unite–for your demanding needs! - Affordable A4 colour laser printer. - Low cost per page in colour and even lower in monochrome with high yield cartridges. - Advanced colour-management tools to control printing costs. - Very quick from the first page: Less than 15 seconds time to first colour page and Up to 25 ppm. - Wide range of expandable options for your growing needs.

name: Logitech Speaker System Z323
description-en_US-print: Transport yourself into your music, movies, and games. Plug in your Logitech® Squeezebox™, gaming console, DVD player, or iPod with the Logitech® Speaker System Z323. Experience full, 360-degree sound. - 360-degree sound: Also known as omnidirectional acoustics, 360-degree sound helps project sound evenly in all directions, giving you a great listening experience throughout the room. - Ported, down-firing subwoofer: Delivers rich bass that brings music, movies, and games to life. - 30 watts (RMS) of power: Fills the room with big, bold sound. Choose how you want to listen. - 1 dual RCA jack and a 3.5 mm jack: Let you easily connect a Logitech Squeezebox™ network music player, DVD player, gaming console, or iPod. - Integrated headphone jack: Lets you listen in private whenever you want.

name: Logitech Z305
description-de_DE-print: Raumfüllender Rundumklang Ihr Lautsprecher gibt den Ton gleichmäßig in alle Richtungen ab, sodass Sie einen vollen, klaren Sound in jedem Winkel des Raums erleben. Plug&Play Ein einzelnes USB-Kabel liefert Strom und reines, digitales Audiovergnügen – ganz ohne Software und externe Stromversorgung. Leichtes Clip-on-Design Der Lautsprecher lässt sich sicher an den meisten Note- und Netbooks befestigen, damit Sie ihn überall dort einsetzen können, wo Sie Ihren Computer benutzen: im Büro, im Bett, auf dem Flughafen usw. Verstaubares Kabel Das USB-Kabel lässt sich leicht in der Rückseite des Lautsprechers verstauen – für einen eleganten Look ohne lästige Kabel. Reise-Etui Ihr Lautsprecher ist beim Transport in der Tasche oder Aktenmappe geschützt. AUX-Eingang Über einen 3,5-mm-Stereoanschluss lassen sich alle tragbaren Audiogeräte oder Computer anschließen. Tragbares Design Dieser kompakte Lautsprecher nimmt nicht viel Platz auf Ihrem Schreibtisch oder im Bücherregal ein – oder in Ihrer Notebooktasche.
description-en_US-print: Room-filling, 360-degree sound Your speaker projects sound more evenly in all directions, so you enjoy rich, clear sound from any angle throughout the room. Plug and play The USB connection delivers power and pure, digital audio from a single cord—without the need for software or an external power supply. Simple, clip-on design Your speaker attaches securely to most laptops and netbooks, so you can easily use it anywhere you use your computer—your office, your bed, the airport and more. Storable cord The USB cable tucks neatly into the back of your speaker, giving you a look that’s sleek and clutter-free. Travel case Your speaker stays protected while inside your bag or briefcase. Auxiliary input A standard 3.5 mm stereo jack opens up your music possibilities to just about any portable music player or computer. Portable design This compact speaker doesn’t take up much room on your desk or bookshelf—or in your laptop bag.
description-fr_FR-print: Son riche à 360 degrés Votre haut-parleur projette le son de manière égale dans toutes les directions pour vous faire profiter d'un son riche et clair dans toute la pièce. Prêt à l'emploi La connexion USB assure la mise sous tension et fournit instantanément un son numérique pur à partir d'un simple câble, sans logiciel ou alimentation externe. Fixation à clip simple Le haut-parleur se fixe solidement à la plupart des ordinateurs portables et des netbooks pour vous accompagner dans toutes les conditions (au bureau, au lit, à l'aéroport, etc.). Câble rétractable Le câble USB s'enroule à l'arrière du haut-parleur pour désencombrer votre espace de travail. Etui de transport Un étui permet de protéger votre haut-parleur lorsqu'il est dans votre sac ou dans votre sacoche. Entrée auxiliaire Une prise stéréo standard 3,5 mm décuple les possibilités musicales et permet de connecter un ordinateur ou un lecteur de musique portable. Conception portable Ce haut-parleur compact ne prend pas beaucoup de place sur votre bureau, votre étagère ou dans votre sacoche d'ordinateur portable.

name: Acer S S191HQLGb
description-de_DE-print: Die Displays der Serie S sind extraflach, haben jedoch eine große Anzeigefläche und eignen sich daher perfekt für Multitasking und zum Surfen im Web. Die Full HD-Auflösung und das besonders hohe Kontrastverhältnis erwecken High Definition-Bilder förmlich zum Leben. Von diesem leistungsstarken Acer-Display werden Sie begeistert sein, von seiner Darstellungsqualität ebenso wie von seinem attraktiven Look! Ultraflaches, platzsparendes Design Die Modelle der Serie S haben ein Design, mit dem sie sich exzellent in jedes Ambiente einbinden lassen, sei es ein Wohnzimmer, ein Heimbüro, ein öffentlicher Bereich oder ein Schalter. Sie sind ultra-flach, und ultra-elegant mit einer rundum modernen, schlichten Ausstrahlung. Umweltfreundliche Technologien Die Serie S wird mit quecksilberfreien Materialien hergestellt und arbeitet mit LED-Technologie. Diese Technologie senkt den Energiebedarf um bis zu 68%, was Kosten spart und zusätzlich die Umwelt schützt. Die Konformität mit dem Standard ENERGY STAR® 5.0 ist ein weiterer Beweis für die ökologische Nachhaltigkeit. Beeindruckende Leistung Dank Full HD-Auflösung sind Spiele spannender und alle Inhalte werden mit präzisen Details auf Kino-Niveau dargestellt. Über den HDMI® oder den DVI Port können Sie die neuesten HD-Geräte anschließen und der unglaubliche Kontrast sorgt für höchste Präzision in der Darstellung.
description-en_US-print: Acer S Series monitors are very slim yet spacious displays that are great for multitasking and web browsing. High-def visuals leap to life thanks to Full HD resolution and an extremely high contrast ratio. You'll appreciate both the imagery and the look of this streamlined yet powerful Acer monitor! Ultra-thin, space-saving design The S Series is designed to fit nicely in your living space, be it at home or in a SOHO, public area, or front-desk setting. Ultra-thin and ultra-elegant, the display is built around a sense of simple modernism. Earth-friendly technologies The S Series uses mercury-free materials and white LED technology for up to 68% lower power consumption, giving you big savings while helping preserve nature's energy resources. By meeting ENERGY STAR® 5.0 requirements, the S Series considers the environment. Impressive performance Games are more exciting and entertainment is truly cinematic with excellent detail courtesy of Full HD resolution. In addition, an HDMI® or DVI interface connects you to the latest high-definition devices, while an astounding contrast ratio delivers fantastic clarity.
description-fr_FR-print: À la fois fins et larges, les écrans de la série S d’Acer sont parfaits pour les activités multitâches et la navigation sur Internet. Les images haute définition prennent vie grâce à la résolution Full HD et au taux de contraste extrêmement élevé. Vous apprécierez non seulement la qualité des images mais également l’allure élancée et puissante de ces écrans Acer. Un design compact et ultrafin Les écrans de la série S sont conçus pour s’intégrer parfaitement dans votre cadre de vie, qu’il s’agisse de votre domicile ou de votre bureau, d’un lieu public ou d’un comptoir. Ultrafins et ultraélégants, ils profitent d’un design à la fois moderne et simple. Des technologies respectueuses de l'environnement Les écrans de la série S sont conçus avec des matériaux exempts de mercure. La technologie à LED blanche permet de diminuer la consommation d’électricité jusqu’à 68 %, ce qui allège considérablement les frais tout en contribuant à préserver les ressources énergétiques de la planète. Conformes aux exigences ENERGY STAR® 5.0, ils ont été conçus dans le souci du plus grand respect de l’environnement. Des performances impressionnantes Grâce à la résolution Full HD, les jeux sont plus passionnants et les divertissements aux détails précis sont dignes des salles de cinéma. En outre, l’interface HDMI® ou DVI vous permet de raccorder les appareils haute définition les plus récents, tandis que le taux de contraste exceptionnel offre une netteté impressionnante.

name: Samsung 46HA590
description-de_DE-print: Diese schlanke und energieeffiziente Serie mit schlanker Slim-LED-Technologie integriert sich hervorragend in elegante Design-Umgebungen und hilft dabei, das Ambiente eines Raumes aufzuwerten. Hinzu kommt ein hervorragendes Full HD-Sehvergnügen. Dank Soundbar-Kompatibilität lässt sich das Klangerlebnis zusätzlich noch aufwerten. Besonders praktisch: Die Software-Uhr, die über einen Knopfdruck auf die Fernbedienung aktiviert werden kann – auch bei ausgeschaltetem Gerät.
description-en_US-print: Full HD 3D experience Slim LED Cutting edge TV technology with Samsung Hospitality Displays. It’s a TV that will satisfy guests looking for the best picture quality, along with an utterly absorbing 3D viewing experience. And because Samsung is at the forefront of 3D technology, viewers will experience the future of home entertainment from the comfort of their room. Available in various screen sizes, Samsung’s Hospitality Displays produce full HD 3D images that are amazingly realistic and bursting with vivid colour. We achieve the very highest standard in 3D imaging through our intuitive 3D HyperReal Engine. This technology controls the colour, contrast, 3D effects and motion for mind-blowing results. Images are so life-like and crystal-clear that they ensure that the viewing experience is not only captivating, but also comfortable. Enjoying 2D images in 3D is a brilliant reality with Samsung Hospitality Displays. At the push of a button Samsung 3D Converter transforms your favourite TV programmes or movies with amazing 3D-depth. It will reinvent your favourite 2D content. Slim LED Superior TVs in your rooms can provide a valuable part of a quality hotel experience. With the eye-catching yet elegant design of our slim LED Hospitality Displays, you can elevate your guest’s viewing pleasure like never before. Created specifically for premium hotels, the sophisticated design of our TVs will become the focal point of your rooms Increased wireless connectivity through AllShare Through Samsung Hospitality Displays with AllShare, powered by DLNA, content including movies, photos and music in DLNA en-abled personal devices can be seamlessly shared between the device and the TV, even wirelessly. That means personal content can be enjoyed on the vivid larger screen, helping to enhance the overall entertainment experience. Energy saving of up to 40% Samsung’s range of energy-efficient LED TVs is setting the standard when it comes to saving energy and reducing costs. Samsung Hospitality Displays are a cost effective business solution due to their energy-efficient features and ability to decrease maintenance and management oversight. Our Hospital-ity Displays offer a number of energy efficient advantages that are designed to lower power usage and your overall energy bill. Samsung LED technology cuts energy consumption by nearly 50% compared with Energy STAR 4.0. This means a 56” Samsung LED TV consumes the same amount of energy as a conventional 32” LCD TV. What’s more, LED TVs from Samsung are durable, offering a long lifetime without loss of picture quality. Samsung Displays are also built with less harmful materials, so that the manufacturing and recycling processes are much more efficient and friendlier to the environment.

name: HP LaserJet CF146A
description-de_DE-print:
Overview
Erstellen Sie professionelle Farbdokumente, mit denen Sie Ihren Umsatz steigern können. Mit HP ePrint können Sie von praktisch überall aus drucken1. Über Geschäftsanwendungen (Business Apps) können Sie webbasiert drucken2,3. Verwenden Sie den Drucker überall im Büro dank integrierter drahtloser Verbindungen3,4.

Features
Profitieren Sie von einer schnellen Einrichtung und einfachem, webbasiertem Drucken.
• Mithilfe von Geschäftsanwendungen und dem Farb-Touchscreen mit 8,9 cm (3,5 Zoll) Diagonale lassen sich Informationen vom Internet aus aufrufen und ausdrucken2,3.

Mit mobilen Druckmöglichkeiten halten Sie Schritt mit dem Unternehmenstempo.
• Mit HP ePrint können Sie von praktisch überall aus drucken1.

Erstellen Sie eindrucksvolle Marketingmaterialien in Farbe.
• Erhalten Sie präzise Farben mit HP ImageREt 3600 und ColorSphere II Toner. Optimieren Sie die Einstellungen mit HP EasyColor.

Für eine geringere Umweltbelastung.
• HP Auto-On/Auto-Off Technologie spart Energie, indem der Drucker bei Bedarf automatisch eingeschaltet und nach dem Druckjob wieder ausgeschaltet wird5.

1 Erfordert eine Internetverbindung zum Drucker. Die Funktion ist bei allen angeschlossenen Internet- und E-mail-fähigen Geräten verwendbar. Erfordert die Registrierung eines HP Web Services-Kontos. Die Druckdauer kann variieren. Eine Liste der unterstützten Dokument- und Bildtypen finden Sie unter www.hp.com/go/eprintcenter. Wenn Sie Informationen über weitere Lösungen benötigen, besuchen Sie uns unter www.hp.com/go/mobile-printing-solutions.
2 Erfordert Wireless Access Point und Internetverbindung zum Drucker. Einige Services erfordern ggf. eine Registrierung. Die Verfügbarkeit von Apps variiert je nach Land, Sprache und Vereinbarungen. Ausführliche Informationen finden Sie unter www.hp.com/go/eprintcenter.
3 Funktion ist nur beim HP LaserJet Pro 200 Color M251nw verfügbar.
4 Die Leistung beim kabellosen Einsatz ist abhängig von den Umgebungsbedingungen und der Entfernung vom Zugangspunkt und ist während aktiven VPN-Verbindungen womöglich eingeschränkt.
5 HP Auto-On/Auto-Off Funktionen hängen vom Drucker und den Einstellungen ab.
description-en_US-print:
Produce professional colour documents that help boost business. Use business apps to access and print from the web.Locate the printer anywhere in the office, using wireless connectivity. Print from virtually anywhere with HP ePrint.
Producing professional-quality color in the office, for printing from virtually anywhere, and for accessing apps to print web content without a PC.

- Use business apps and the 3.5-inch (8.89 cm) colour touchscreen to access and print from the web.
- Print from virtually anywhere with HP ePrint.
- Set up anywhere in the office with built-in wireless networking. Share printing resources on a network.
- Print from a flash drive, using the easy-access USB port.
- Produce vivid colours with HP ImageREt 3600 and ColorSphere II toner. Optimize settings with HP EasyColor.
- Boost productivity with print speeds up to 14 pages per minute A4 and letter.
- Create impressive colour marketing materials in the office on a range of media, including HP specialty papers.
- Print documents affordably. Get the same black cost per page as a black-only HP LaserJet printer.
description-fr_FR-print:
Overview
Créez des documents couleur professionnels que contribueront à dynamiser l'entreprise. Imprimez où que vous soyez avec HP ePrint1. Utilisez les applications professionnelles pour accéder au Web et imprimer à partir du Web2, 3. Connectez-vous à l'imprimante où que vous soyez dans le bureau, grâce à la connectivité sans fil3, 4.

Features
Bénéficiez d'une configuration rapide et d'impression facile connectée à Internet.
• Utilisez les applications pour l'entreprise et l'écran tactile couleur de 8,89 cm (3,5 pouces) pour accéder au Web et imprimer des pages Internet2, 3.

Maintenir le rythme de l'activité grâce à l'impression mobile.
• Imprimez où que vous soyez avec HP ePrint1.

Créez des documents de marketing couleur à impact élevé.
• Obtenez des couleurs exactes avec HP ImageREt 3600 et le Toner ColorSphere II toner. Optimisez les paramètres avec HP EasyColor.

Réduisez votre impact environnemental.
• Réduire la consommation d'énergie avec la technologie HP Auto-On/Auto-Off qui met l'imprimante sous tension et hors tension en fonction des besoins5.

1 Nécessite une connexion Internet à l'imprimante. Fonctionne avec tout périphérique compatible Internet et messagerie électronique. Nécessite HP Web Services Account Registration. Durées d'impression variables. Pour une liste des types de documents et d'images pris en charge : www.hp.com/go/eprintcenter. Pour des solutions supplémentaires, reportez-vous à la page www.hp.com/go/mobile-printing-solutions.
2 Nécessite un point d'accès sans fil et une connexion Internet à l'imprimante. Les services peuvent nécessiter une inscription. La disponibilité de l'application varie selon le pays, la langue et les accords. Pour plus d'informations, voir le site http://www.hp.com/go/eprintcenter.
3 Fonction uniquement disponible sur les imprimantes couleur HP LaserJet Pro 200M251nw .
4Les performances sans fil dépendent de l'environnement physique et de la distance par rapport au point d'accès. Elles peuvent être limitées pendant les connexions actives au réseau privé virtuel.
5 Les fonctions HP Auto-On/Auto-Off dépendent de l'imprimante et des paramètres.

name: Toshiba 46TL933
description-en_US-print: The Toshiba TL933/963 series puts 3D into everyone's reach. So if you’d like a great 3D cinema experience in your living room, this is the TV for you. Whether you’re watching in 2D or 3D, the picture quality is glorious in 1080p full high definition, and our 200 AMR (Active Motion & Resolution) technology gives a high refresh rate that can easily keep up with the fastest moving sports, games and movies. On top of that it’s a Smart TV, so you can easily enjoy entertainment from the internet. DIVE INTO 3D Once you dive into the next dimension of 3D, you will never look back. Movies, sports and gaming will never be the same after you enjoy the magic of Toshiba Full HD 3D. Our 2D-to-3D upconversion software is also built in, so you can add 3D effects to movies shot in 2D. (Note: 3D-glasses sold separately). KEEP UP WITH THE ACTION The action stays crisp, fast and smooth thanks to our 200 AMR (Active Motion & Resolution) HD image-processing technology. It cuts motion blur and keeps the refresh rate high, so the TL933/963 series can easily keep up with the fastest moving sports and action sequences. GET INTO SMART TV Now you can watch entertainment from the internet on the best screen in the house. With just a few clicks of the remote, you’ll be watch videos on YouTube, catching up with Euronews or sharing photos on Flickr. You can also view and share a wide range of other online content via various service providers through the Toshiba Places internet portal GREAT CONNECTIONS Connect your TV to your home network and enjoy all the music, videos and photos stored on your computer on the big screen via WiDi technology*. On top of that four HDMI ports and two USB ports mean there’s plenty of room to connect all your other devices and with the USB Video Recording function* you can record your favourite programmes. CONTROL FROM YOUR PHONE You can now control your TV with your smart device based on iOS (iPod Touch, iPhone or iPad) or Android operating system, allowing you to change the channel or turn the volume up with a swipe of your finger. Just download our free app, Toshiba AppsConnect, from iTunes or Android Market. RICHER VIEWING Become a more discerning viewer with our pre-installed MediaGuide, powered by Rovi. It helps you to decide what to watch from a database of over 2.5 million titles and gives richer multimedia background information than standard electronic programme guides.

name: Canon i-SENSYS LBP6020
description-en_US-print: Compact, energy-efficient desktop mono laser printer A space saving, affordable mono laser printer that’s perfect for personal use. Delivering quality, maintenance-free prints, this energy-saving device is easy to use and exceptionally quiet. - Space-saving design - 18 ppm, 7.8 seconds First Print Out Time - Energy efficient - Quiet operation - All-in-One cartridge for maintenance free operation Compact and space saving Designed to fit comfortably on the desk, this compact and affordable mono laser printer is perfect for personal use. Its sleek, space-saving design includes a retractable paper tray cover and keeps dimension to a mere 359 x 249 x 198 mm (W x D x H) Productive performance Take advantage of professional laser print speeds of 18 ppm. Canon’s Quick First-Print technologies ensures quick recovery from sleep mode and with a First Print Out Time of just 7.8 seconds, you can quickly get back to what’s important, without waiting around for your prints. Exceptional laser quality Deliver the sharpest, crispest text and most detailed graphics thanks to a print resolution of up to 2400 x 600 dpi with Automatic Image Refinement. Our MS (Magnetic Spherical) Toner has been specifically developed to deliver the optimum results print after print. Efficient and quiet This energy efficient printer uses only 0.8 watts in sleep mode. A convenient front power switch makes it easy to turn off, cutting energy costs even further. Thanks to Canon’s unique engine design, the i-SENSYS LBP6020 is silent in standby and exceptionally quiet during operation – so you can focus on your work without intrusion. All-in-One cartridge The All-in-One recyclable cartridge ensures maintenance-free operation and continuous high quality output. Replace the compact cartridge in seconds – containing toner, drum and cleaning units – with an Authentic Canon Laser Cartridge and your printer is as good as new.
description-fr_FR-print: Imprimante laser noir et blanc de bureau, compacte et économe en énergie Imprimante laser noir et blanc compacte et économique, parfaite pour une utilisation personnelle. Impressions de qualité sans aucune maintenance grâce à ce périphérique économe en énergie, simple à utiliser et exceptionnellement silencieux. Points forts - Design peu encombrant - 18 ppm, première sortie en 7,8 secondes - Faible consommation d'énergie - Fonctionnement silencieux - Cartouche Tout-en-Un pour un fonctionnement sans maintenance Compacte, pour un encombrement réduit Conçue pour être placée sans difficulté sur tous les bureaux, cette imprimante laser noir et blanc compacte et abordable est parfaite pour une utilisation personnelle. Design épuré et peu encombrant avec couvercle de bac à papier rétractable pour dimensions de seulement 359 × 249 × 198 mm (L × P × H). Excellente productivité Profitez de tous les avantages d'une vitesse d'impression professionnelle de 18 ppm. Les technologies « Quick First Print » (première impression rapide) Canon assurent une reprise rapide après le mode veille : la première impression est effectuée en 7,8 secondes, ce qui vous permet de vous consacrer à des tâches plus importantes sans avoir à attendre vos impressions. Qualité laser exceptionnelle Obtenez un texte ultra net et des graphiques aux détails précis grâce à une résolution d'impression qui atteint 2400 × 600 dpi et à la fonction de lissage automatique d'image. Notre toner MS (Magnetic Spherical - sphérique magnétique) est conçu pour produire des résultats exceptionnels, page après page. Faible consommation d'énergie et fonctionnement silencieux Cette imprimante très économe en énergie consomme seulement 0,8 watt en mode veille. L'interrupteur placé à l'avant de l'imprimante permet de la mettre facilement hors tension, pour encore plus d'économies d'énergie. Canon a mis au point un moteur exclusif qui permet à l'i-SENSYS LBP6020 d'être parfaitement silencieuse en veille et incroyablement peu bruyante pendant l'impression. Vous pourrez ainsi vous concentrer sur vos projets en cours sans être dérangé par des bruits intempestifs. Cartouche Tout-en-Un La cartouche Tout-en-Un recyclable garantit un fonctionnement sans entretien et des sorties d'une qualité constante. Quelques secondes suffisent à remplacer la cartouche compacte (qui comprend le toner, le rouleau et les unités de nettoyage) par une cartouche laser Canon authentique, et votre périphérique fonctionnera comme au premier jour.

name: Trust Magna 2.1
description-de_DE-print: 2.1-Lautsprecherset mit Subwoofer aus Holz und einer Gesamtausgangsleistung von 35 Watt RMS (Spitzenleistung 70 Watt). Leistungsstarker Subwoofer für tiefe und solide Bässe für gesteigertes Musik- und Spielerlebnis. Gut zugängliche Kabelfernbedienung mit Lautstärkeregler sowie iPod/MP3- und Kopfhöreranschluss. Praktischer zusätzlicher Line-In-Anschluss an der Fernbedienung für iPod-Geräte oder andere tragbare Medienplayer. Kompakte und platzsparende Satellitenlautsprecher für klare Klangwiedergabe im Mittel- und Hochtonbereich. Zusätzlicher Bassregler an der Rückseite des Subwoofers.
description-en_US-print:
- 2.1 speaker set including wooden subwoofer with a total RMS power output of 35 Watt (70 Watt peak power)
- Powerful subwoofer for a deep and solid bass to boost your music and gaming experience
- Easily accessible wired remote control with volume control and iPod/MP3 and headphone connection
- Convenient extra line-in connection on the remote control for iPod or other portable media player
- Compact, space saving satellite design for clear mid and high range audio
- Extra bass control on the back of the subwoofer
description-fr_FR-print: Système d'enceintes 2.1 incluant un caisson de basses en bois d'une puissance totale de 35 W RMS (70 W en puissance de pointe). Caisson de basses puissant offrant des basses profondes et solides qui dynamisent votre musique et vos jeux. Commande sur câble facilement accessible avec réglage du volume et connexions pour iPod/MP3 et casque. Connexion supplémentaire line-in sur la commande pour brancher un iPod ou tout autre appareil de lecture de médias. Enceintes satellites compactes et peu encombrantes pour une restitution claire des aigus et des médiums. Réglage supplémentaire des basses à l'arrière du caisson de basses.

name: Lenco XEMIO-858
description-de_DE-print: - 2,4" (6 CM) TFT-Touchscreen - E-Book-Funktion (unterstützt TXT-Dateien) - uKW-Radio - Sprachaufzeichnungsfunktion - Audioformate: MP3, WMA, APE, FLAC, OGG und WAV - Videoformate: RM, RMVB, FLV, 3GP, WMV und AVI - Fotoformate: JPG, BMP, PNG, TIFF und GIF - Spielzeit im Musikmodus ca. 8 Stunden - Spielzeit im Videomodus ca. 3 Stunden Anschlussbuchse - microSD-Kartenleser fur Karten bis zu 8 GB Inklusiv - USB-Kabel - Ohrhörer - Software CD
description-en_US-print: - 2,4" (6 CM) TFT touchscreen - E-book function (supports TXT files) - FM radio - Voice recording function - Audio formats: MP3, WMA, APE, FLAC, OGG and WAV - Video formats: RM, RMVB, FLV, 3GP, WMV and AVI - Photo formats: JPG, BMP, PNG, TIFF and GIF - Playback time in music mode approx. 8 hours - Playback time in video mode approx. 3 hours Connections - microSD card reader for cards up to 8GB Including - USB cable - Earphones - Software CD
description-fr_FR-print:
- Écran tactile TFT 2,4 pouces (6 cm)
- Fonction E-Book
- Radio FM
- Formats audio : MP3, WMA, APE, FLAC, OGG et WAV
- Formats video : RM, RMVB, FLV, 3GP, WMV et AVI
- Formats photos: JPG, BMP, PNG, TIFF et GIF
- La fonction E-book prend en charge les fichiers TXT
- Fonction enregistrement de voix
- Temps de lecture en mode vidéo environ 3 heures
- Temps de lecture en mode audio environ 8 heures

name: Logitech C110
description-de_DE-print: Dank Plug&Play-Einrichtung, VGA-Videoqualität und integriertem Mikrofon ist es mit dieser Webcam ein Kinderspiel, Videogespräche zu führen und Fotos (1.3MP) zu verschicken. Plug&Play-Installation, einfache Bedienung Dank der einfachen Plug&Play-Installation können Sie schnell Videogespräche führen – über die meisten Instant Messenger und Logitech Vid HD. Klar verständliche Videogespräche Dank VGA-Sensor sehen Ihre Familie und Freunde Sie bei Gesprächen in realistischen Farben. Fotos mit 1.3 Megapixeln Sie können auch ganz einfach Schnappschüsse mit bis zu 1.3 Megapixeln aufnehmen (Software-interpoliert). XVGA-Videoaufnahmen Lebendige, farbenfrohe Videoaufnahmen in XVGA-Auflösung (1024 x 768), die Sie mit Ihren Freunden, Ihrer Familie oder der ganzen Welt teilen können – auf Facebook, YouTube, Twitter oder in Ihrem Blog. Integriertes Mikrofon mit RightSound Klar verständliche Gespräche ohne störende Hintergrundgeräusche. Universalhalterung Befestigen Sie Ihre Webcam sicher am Notebook oder LCD-Monitor oder stellen Sie sie ins Regal oder auf den Schreibtisch.
description-en_US-print: Logitech C110. Megapixel: 1.3. Maximum image resolution: 1024 x 768, Still image resolution(s): 1024 x 768. Interface: USB, Colour of product: Black, White, Mounting type: Clip/Stand. Power source: DC. Minimum processor: 1.6GHz

name: ION Slide 2 PC/Mac
description-en_US-print: Bring your old pictures back to life! SLIDES 2 PC makes it easy and fun to rediscover your 35mm film negatives and slides on your computer. Incredibly fast, one-touch scanning and a single-cable connection make SLIDES 2 PC perfect for archiving your memories, your family's memories and your friends' memories! If you're like one of the millions of people who have boxes of slide carousels in the attic or a stack of those little yellow boxes in the kitchen, SLIDES 2 PC is perfect for you! Don't know what happened to your projector? Don't know where to buy a replacement bulb for your projector? SLIDES 2 PC eliminates the hassle and brings those memories of family dinners, graduations, vacations, and joyous occasions back into your life. Just install the included software on your computer, connect SLIDES 2 PC using the attached cable, and load up to 20 slides into the included Rapid Slide Feeder for quick, hassle-free scanning; you'll be reliving all of your treasured memories in no time! A blue light even indicates when SLIDES 2 PC is correctly connected to your computer and ready to scan. SLIDES 2 PC is a high-resolution scanner with a high-quality optic element. This outstanding attention to quality ensures that you can capture all of the color and detail in each one of your slides or negatives. Fixed-focus range, automatic exposure and color balance guarantee that your memories are captured optimally with accurate color conversion and perfect imaging. Don't let your memories collect dust or turn yellow one day longer! Enjoy them every day and share them with SLIDES 2 PC.

name: LG 26LV255H LED TV
description-en_US-print: LG INTERACTIVE TV(Ready) has been designed for hoteliers who are seeking to provide their guests with value added in-room services at minimum cost. With Pro:Centric solution-enabled LG Interactive TVs, hotels can greet their guests with a welcome message. It can also provide guests with vital hotel information such as local tourist attractions and facility information far more easily. Contents can be updated through a web-based editor and it also allows hotels to remotely manage cloning and channel mapping via a remote server. For hotels without their own server, LG offers Pro:Centric server which has been optimized for hotel users.

name: Canon PowerShot A4000 IS
description-en_US-print:
Advanced capabilities and chic style set PowerShot A4000 IS digital camera apart from the crowd. In a new high for the A-Series, it's equipped with a powerful 8x Optical Zoom to get you close to the action fast, and a 28mm Wide-Angle lens and Optical Image Stabilizer that deliver beautifully clear images with more excitement in every frame. This chic, compact camera in a range of appealing colors has a 16.0 Megapixel Image Sensor with DIGIC 4 Image Processor to ensure superior resolution and fast performance. Beautiful images are easy thanks to Smart AUTO that picks the perfect camera settings for 32 predefined shooting situations, and Intelligent IS that automatically optimizes image stabilization based on the shooting conditions. Touch a button and you'll be shooting brilliantly lifelike 720p HD video!

- 8x Optical Zoom with 28mm Wide-Angle lens and Optical Image Stabilizer deliver stunning images.
- A 16.0 Megapixel Image Sensor with DIGIC 4 Image Processor for exceptional performance.
- Smart AUTO intelligently selects the proper camera settings based on 32 predefined shooting situations for capturing spectacular images with ease.
- Shoot brilliant 720p HD video with a dedicated movie button.
- A 3.0-inch LCD enables easy viewing.
- Intelligent IS automatically chooses from six different modes to optimize image stabilization for the shooting condition.
- Help Button provides simple explanations and easy controls of your settings.
- Scene Modes such as Super Vivid, Poster Effect and Miniature Effect provide creative freedom to capture your photos.
- Lithium-ion battery makes it easy to recharge your batteries.

name: Samsung UE40ES7000Q
description-en_US-print: Samsung UE40ES7000Q. HD type: Full HD, Display resolution: 1920 x 1080, Aspect ratio: 16:9. Tuner type: Analogue & Digital, Digital signal format system: DVB-C, DVB-S2, DVB-T. Audio system: Dolby Digital Plus / Dolby Pulse. Consumer Electronics Control (CEC): Anynet+. Power consumption (standby): 0.1, Energy efficiency class: B, Input voltage: 220 - 240

name: Sony HDR-PJ10E
description-de_DE-print: Teilen Sie diese ganz besonderen Erinnerungen mit allen im Raum. Dieser bedienfreundliche Full HD Camcorder verfügt über einen integrierten Projektor, mit dem Sie Ihre Videos auf jede Fläche werfen können. So teilt man heute mit anderen schöne Erinnerungen. Beste Full HD-Bilder Steigen Sie um und genießen Sie die klarsten und detailgetreuesten Videoaufnahmen, die Sie je von einem Camcorder gesehen haben. Mit dem neuen progressiven 1920x1080/50p-Aufnahmemodus mit sehr hohen Bitraten und 50 Full HD-Bildern pro Sekunde für besonders klare Ergebnisse. Projizieren Sie Ihre Bilder auf jede vorhandene Oberfläche Manchmal möchte man einfach mit allen seine Erinnerungen auf Video teilen, aber es ist kein Fernseher im Raum. Mit der Handycam können Sie jetzt gestochen scharfe, detailreiche Videoclips direkt auf eine vorhandene flache Oberfläche projizieren – ob das nun eine Wand, eine Decke oder aber das T-Shirt eines Freundes ist. Beeindruckender Hörgenuss Haben Ihre Videos nicht einen besseren Soundtrack verdient? Mit der präzisen Mikrofonanordnung kann 5.1-Surround Sound mit größerer Empfindlichkeit und weniger Windgeräuschen aufgenommen werden. Stereolautsprecher und S-Master-Technologie sorgen für klaren Sound während der Wiedergabe auf dem Camcorder. Schlechte Beleuchtung – kein Problem Viele Camcorder nehmen bei schlechten Lichtverhältnissen grobkörnige, unscharfe Bilder auf. Der besonders empfindliche Exmor R CMOS Sensor reduziert das Bildrauschen und erzeugt so klarere Bilder. In Kombination mit dem leistungsstarken BIONZ Prozessor erhalten Sie fantastische Ergebnisse auch in geschlossenen Räumen oder bei Einbruch der Dunkelheit. Einfach mehr im Bild Bringen Sie wirklich alle ins Bild – bei Partys, Geburtstagsfeiern und anderen besonderen Anlässen. Das hochwertige Sony G-Objektiv bietet jetzt einen noch größeren Weitwinkel und deckt damit einen noch größeren Bildbereich ab, ohne dass Sie sich dafür weiter vom Motiv entfernen müssen.
description-en_US-print: Let everyone in the room enjoy your special memories. Inside this compact, easy to use Full HD camcorder there's a projector that beams your videos onto any nearby surface. It's the smart, fun new way for everyone to share the action. Best Full HD pictures Move up to the smoothest, most detailed video images you've ever seen from a camcorder. New 1920x1080/50p mode records at a very high frame rate in progressive mode, capturing 50 Full HD frames every second for extra-clear results. Project your image anywhere Sometimes you want everyone to see your video memories, but there's no TV in the room to hook up with. Now Handycam lets you project crisp, detailed video clips directly onto any nearby flat surface - from walls and ceilings to a friend's t-shirt. Sounds amazing Don't your videos deserve a better soundtrack? The precision microphone array captures 5.1-ch surround sound with greater sensitivity and reduced wind noise. Stereo speakers and S-Master technology assure clear sound during playback on your camcorder. Low light, no problem Many camcorders struggle in low light, producing grainy, fuzzy images. Super sensitive Exmor R CMOS Sensor reduces image noise for clearer images. In conjunction with the powerful BIONZ processor you’ll get great results in dim interiors or at dusk. Pack more into every scene Make sure nobody’s left out of the picture at parties, birthdays and other special occasions. The high quality G Lens by Sony features enhanced wide angle performance, capturing a bigger image area without you having to stand back.

name: Lexmark C746dtn
description-en_US-print: Intuitive navigation The 2.4-inch LCD is easy to read and the colour graphics make navigation and troubleshooting intuitive. Corporate colour matching Match corporate colours on marketing collateral and brand-sensitive text and graphics with Lexmark Named Color Replacement and PANTONE® calibration. Use less energy The instant warm-up fuser reduces energy consumption and delivers a time to first page as fast as 9 seconds in both black and colour. Multiple media support Expand input capacity with optional paper drawers that let you load multiple paper types and boost total input capacity up to 4,300 sheets. Eco-friendly printing Print responsibly with Eco-Settings that let you customise print settings and Hibernate Mode which reduces energy consumption to less than one watt. High-speed processing The high-speed processor and Gigabit Ethernet networking mean fast data transfer and fast processing,even on complex colour documents.

name: Samsung 40'' HA790
description-en_US-print: Samsung 40'' HA790. HD type: Full HD, Display resolution: 1920 x 1080, Aspect ratio: 16:9. Tuner type: Analogue & Digital, Digital signal format system: DVB-C, DVB-S2, DVB-T. Audio system: SRS TruSurround HD. Consumer Electronics Control (CEC): Anynet+. Cable lock slot: Kensington
description-fr_FR-print: SAMSUNG Electronics, un des leaders mondiaux des écrans plats, annonce le lancement de sa toute dernière gamme de téléviseurs « Hospitality TV » pour l’hôtellerie. Conçus pour moderniser les chambres d'hôtel, ces nouveaux téléviseurs sont dotés des toutes dernières technologies pour une diffusion numérique haute définition, une consommation d’énergie réduite et une installation facile. Leur design élégant aux finitions brillantes est adapté au style de tous les hôtels, de l'hôtel économique à l'hôtel de luxe. Alors que l'industrie hôtelière se prépare à vivre l’une des transitions les plus importantes de son histoire depuis la télévision en noir et blanc, SAMSUNG a doté tous ses téléviseurs « Hospitality TV » d'un tuner numérique pour recevoir les programmes en haute définition. Cette nouvelle gamme de téléviseurs est également fabriquée avec des matériaux plus écologiques et plus économes en énergie. (la consommation d'énergie est réduite de 60 % par rapport à un téléviseur traditionnel). « Le secteur de l'hôtellerie fait désormais des choix réfléchis en matière de technologie. Les hôteliers sont sensibles au design et aux économies d'énergie mais ils désirent également remplacer leurs anciens modèles analogiques par des écrans plats LCD modernes.Ils sont dotés de la technologie de «clonage» via USB, qui permet de dupliquer sur chaque téléviseur les paramètres, les chaînes et les logos de l'hôtel très facilement. Cette nouvelle technologie constitue une économie de temps et d'argent considérable pour les hôtels et une garantie d’avoir les mêmes réglages standards sur tous les téléviseurs. Les hôteliers peuvent également afficher leur logo pendant 3 à 7 secondes lors de l’allumage de l’écran (durée réglable), ce qui leur permet de mettre en valeur leur marque auprès de leur clientèle. Les téléviseurs Hospitality intègrent également une prise d’alimentation à l’arrière de l’écran pour alimenter directement la Set-Top Box et peuvent être connectés à des enceintes externes installées dans la salle de bain pour profiter au maximum de la radio. Pour une plus grande connectivité entre les écrans plats et les appareils multimédia, les téléviseurs Hospitality sont compatibles avec les prises externes Jack Pack qui peuvent être installées n’importe où dans la chambre d’hôtel. Les clients peuvent ainsi écouter leur musique préférée ou regarder leurs photos sur l’écran du téléviseur. Enfin, les téléviseurs Hospitality de SAMSUNG ont une télécommande multi codes. Cette fonction est particulièrement pratique pour les salles de sport ou les cafétérias afin de changer le programme sur tous les écrans avec une seule télécommande. Les téléviseurs des séries 450 et 457 disposent de la technologie HD Ready et d’une finition noire élégante.

name: Canon LEGRIA HF M506
description-en_US-print: Canon LEGRIA HF M506 Exceptional video quality for every occasion The LEGRIA HF M506 delivers professional quality video with ease whatever the occasion. Featuring Canon’s HD CMOS PRO sensor and Audio Scene Select movies look and sound superb. Benefits - Canon HD CMOS PRO sensor; - Optical Intelligent IS; - Audio Scene Select; - 10x HD Video lens, iris diaphragm; - Creative cinematic features; - 7.5cm intuitive touch screen; - Smart Auto (38 scenes), Face Detection, Instant AF; - SDXC card slot. Canon HD CMOS PRO sensor The HD CMOS PRO sensor is designed and made by Canon for its professional camcorders. The light gathering area of the pixels is 160% bigger than conventional CMOS sensors, delivering a wider dynamic range and advanced low-light performance. Optical Intelligent IS Intelligent IS is the perfect solution to camera shake. It automatically detects the scene and selects exactly the right optical Image Stabilizer settings from 4 modes to counteract movement and prevent blur. It ensures sharp, detailed videos in every situation - leaving you free to concentrate on shooting. Audio Scene Select It’s simple to make your movies sound as good as they look with Audio Scene Select and a high-sensitivity, built-in zoom microphone.. Just select from 5 scene modes and audio settings are optimised automatically. Canon HD Video lens A high-quality, Canon HD Video lens with 10x optical zoom features an iris diaphragm for soft background blurring. Creative cinematic features Use Story Creator to develop your video skills and effortlessly create memorable short videos with a story - just choose a theme and follow the in-built scene suggestions. Inspire your creativity with Cinema-Look Filters and add fun effects to your movies without a PC using Touch Decoration. Write messages straight on the Touch-screen with the Stylus Pen, add stamps or active animations like shooting stars and mix in still images. Fingertip control Operation is easy with a high-resolution 7.5cm (3.0”) gesture-based Touch-screen LCD, which gives you intuitive fingertip control of shooting and playback functions. Effortless shooting Creating high-quality movies is effortless with Smart Auto. Fully automatic, it intelligently selects shooting settings from 38 scenes – leaving you free to concentrate on your subject. Face Detection optimises the settings for great people shots and Instant AF ensures fast and accurate focusing. SDXC card slot The LEGRIA HF M506 records Full HD movies direct to an SDXC memory card. Available in a wide range of sizes, the cards are easy to carry and ideal for sharing.

name: Trust Sphere Notebook Speaker
description-de_DE-print: Kompaktes, leichtes und einfach anzuschließendes Lautsprecherset für verbesserte Klangqualität von Notebooks. Verbessert die Klangleistung um bis zu 200 % im Vergleich mit eingebauten Notebook-Lautsprechern. Kompaktes und leichtes Design – einfacher Transport. Kann überall genutzt werden – kein Netzteil erforderlich. Einfach anschließen und Wiedergabe starten – kein Treiber erforderlich. Leistungs- und Lautstärkeregler.
description-en_US-print: Compact, lightweight and easy to connect speaker set that improves your notebook sound, wherever you are. Upgrades the sound performance up to 200% compared with built-in notebook speakers. Compact and lightweight design; easy to take with you. Use it anywhere you like; no power adapter needed. Just plug-in & start listening, no driver needed. Controls for power and volume adjustment.
description-fr_FR-print: Système d'enceintes compact, léger et facile à brancher pour améliorer le son de votre ordinateur portable, où que vous soyez. Améliore les performances sonores de 200 % en comparaison avec les enceintes intégrées des ordinateurs portables. Modèle compact et léger ; facile à emporter. Utilisable en tout lieu ; pas d’adaptateur d’alimentation nécessaire. Opérationnel & dès son branchement, aucun pilote nécessaire. Commande d'alimentation et réglage du volume.

name: Canon Smartbase MP370 Inkjet 18ppm Zwart 12ppm Kleur 4800X1200dpi Printreso
description-en_US-print:
Easy direct photo printing, delivering professional quality images Enjoy fast and easy home photo printing, without the need for a PC. Providing high quality prints, using either camera direct printing or card direct printing with a convenient photo index sheet.
-Digital Photo All-in-One .
-Professional photo quality .
-Advanced MicroFine Droplet Technology™ .
-Camera & Card direct printing .
-Easy Photo Index Sheet .
-Borderless printing/copying. 
-Fast print/copy speed .
-USB 2.0 Hi-Speed interface  .

name: Fujitsu fi-6800
description-en_US-print: With improving the entire scanning process as it's main objective, the Fujitsu fi-6800 Production Scanner builds upon the qualities that have made Fujitsu the industry-leading vendor in Mid-Volume Production market the fi-6800 incorporates many additional features and functions that will can improve your document scanning efficiency. From pure scanning speed, to ease of use for user operation or a full suite of software productivity tools, the fi-6800 is the ideal solution for a wide range of Production Scanning applications. Features include: The ideal blend of features and performance to maximize scanning productivity - Fast, 130 ppm (simplex) / 260 ipm (duplex) scanning in monochrome or color (letter, landscape @ 300 dpi) - Space-saving design with quiet operation and many environmental friendly qualities - Easy to use operator panel with multi-language support - Triple Ultrasonic Double Feed Detection with Intelligent MultiFeed Function and retain image feature - 500-page automatic document feeder with adjustable height hopper - Reduce document preparation and produce outstanding image quality with VRS® 4.5 Professional - Full suite of bundled software and industry-leading third party interoperability - Maintain optimal up-time and peak performance with Fujitsu service and support

name: Kyocera FS-4300DN
description-de_DE-print:
- Geringste Druckkosten seiner Klasse
- Bis zu 60 Seiten A4 pro Minute
- 600 Blatt Papierkapazität, maximal 2.600 Blatt
- Integrierte Duplex-Einheit für beidseitigen Druck
- USB 2.0- und GigaBit-Netzwerkschnittstelle
- 5-zeiliges LCD und alphanumerischer Tastenblock
- Niedriger Stromverbrauch (gemessen am TEC-Wert)
- Klimaneutraler KYOCERA Toner*

Mit einer rasanten Geschwindigkeit von bis zu 60 Seiten pro Minute ist der FS-4300DN die ideale Alternative für alle, die nach maximaler Leistungsfähigkeit suchen und dabei nicht auf extrem niedrige Druck- und Energiekosten verzichten wollen. Der zuverlässige FS-4300DN ist geradezu prädestiniert für große Arbeitsgruppen mit hohem Druckaufkommen.
description-en_US-print:
Power up your department with our premium A4 network device

- Up to 60 pages per minute in A4 with up to 1,200 dpi resolution
- Gigabit network functionality as standard
- Lowest power consumption (TEC) in its class
- Duplex printing and N-up printing reduces paper consumption
- Up to 6 paper trays for superior flexibility and high capacity
- Alphanumeric keyboard for easy password entering (Private Print)
- Convenient printing directly from USB Flash memory device
- Data Security Kit E provides high level security for optional HD-6
- Long-life drum and developer lasts for 500,000 pages A4
- Exceptionally low printing costs in its class

This very powerful printer, designed for high print volumes is capable of delivering up to 60 ppm. It is easily integrated into your network and can be equiped with paper capacity of up to 2,600 pages. Long life components guarantee tough durable performance that results in incredibly low printing costs and environmental impact.

name: Belkin F7D7602
description-en_US-print: Watch Your Home in Vivid HD from Mobile Devices Not only does the Belkin NetCam HD allow you to keep tabs on kids or pets from your smartphone or tablet--it also allows you to see all the action in vibrant 720p HD video. Ideal for anyone who has kids, pets, or grandparents at home, the camera captures smooth video and crisp digital audio that makes you feel like you're right there with them. You can watch and hear all the fun on your mobile device, wherever you go. The Next Best Thing to Being There You'll see the HD difference the moment you start watching on your tablet or smartphone. The video is exceptionally smooth, and the details and color are so vivid you'll feel like you never left home. With standard-definition video quickly becoming obsolete, the Belkin NetCam HD ensures that you can take full advantage of your mobile device's high-definition video and audio capabilities. Effortless Setup--No Computer Required Forget hassling with installation CDs and complicated user manuals. All you have to do to get the Belkin NetCam HD up and running is download the free NetCam app to your mobile device. The camera connects to your home's Wi-Fi router and starts streaming video and audio to your smartphone or tablet. You don't even need a computer or laptop. See Everything with Wide-Angle Lens and Night Vision The camera's wide-view lens is ideal for monitoring a large living room or backyard. Additionally, night vision lets you watch after dark or in dim lighting, which is particularly useful for monitoring a child's nursery or bedroom during naptime. Record Remotely to Capture Memorable Moments Whether you're missing a party or playtime back at home, the Belkin NetCam HD has you covered. With the help of the free NetCam app, you can choose to record the sights and sounds directly to your mobile device. The camera's HD video and digital audio keep your recordings crisp and clear, making them more fun to watch again later. Receive Email or Text Alerts When Motion Detected The NetCam app also gives you the option of receiving email or text alerts whenever the camera detects movement. If the kids are asleep, you can stop watching and wait for a text or email notification before you tune in. Compatible with Apple and Android Devices The Belkin NetCam HD works with the following Apple devices with iOS 4.2 or higher: iPod touch, iPhone, and iPad. It also works with Android devices with version 2.2 or higher. A Wi-Fi router with an Internet connection is required.

name: Canon LEGRIA 8155B015 hand-held camcorder
description-en_US-print: Capture Full HD movies without ever worrying about camera shake with the LEGRIA HF R406. Get closer with 53x Advanced zoom and create movies that sound as good as they look with Audio Scene Select. Optical Intelligent IS Intelligent IS is the perfect solution to combat camera shake by detecting the scene and automatically selecting from four stabilisation modes to counteract movement and prevent blur. The advanced dynamic mode corrects roll and tilt movements that can occur when walking, ensuring sharp steady videos in every situation. 53x Advanced zoom; Full HD CMOS A genuine Canon HD video lens with 53x Advanced Zoom lets you capture all the detail in even far away subjects. The Full HD CMOS sensor gives true HD quality and excellent colour reproduction even in low light, so your movies will look great on your HDTV. Baby Mode Capture your child’s first steps, first words, or many other firsts with Baby Mode. Register your child’s date of birth in-camera, and add colourful stamps for height and weight. All footage will automatically be sorted to the baby album. Advanced image processing The powerful DIGIC DV4 imaging processor ensures higher image quality in low light and a substantial reduction in image distortion as it works together with the optical image stabiliser. Superb quality recording Bring out the best of Full HD with progressive recording at the highest rates for AVCHD(28Mbps) and MP4 (35Mbps). Whether you’re showcasing or sharing, simply select the ideal format and choose from a range of recording rates. Audio Scene Select It’s simple to make your movies sound as good as they look with Audio Scene Select. Just select from 5 scene modes and audio settings are optimised automatically to match the scene you’re shooting. So whether you’re filming speech at a wedding or music at a concert, you can enjoy immersive, realistic audio. Fingertip control Smooth operation is easy with a high-resolution 7.5cm capacitive touch screen LCD, which gives you intuitive control of settings and simplifies playback. Opening the LCD panel quick starts the camcorder, so you’ll never miss a moment. Cinema-Look filters; Touch Decoration Inspire your creativity with Cinema-Look Filters. Select from 7 adjustable colour-grading filters to capture the perfect movie scene. Adding fun effects to your movies without a PC is easy using Touch Decoration. SDXC card slot The LEGRIA HF R406 records Full HD movies direct to an SDXC memory card which are available in a wide range of sizes allowing you to capture hours of footage.

name: HP Scanjet N6350
description-de_DE-print:
Overview
Vielfältige moderne Dokumentenerfassungstools können über das Wired-Ethernet-Netzwerk gemeinsam genutzt werden: So arbeiten Teams und Büros noch produktiver. Umfangreiche Dokumente lassen sich – ein- oder beidseitig – in einem Durchgang scannen und via Netzwerkordner oder E-Mail verteilen.

Features
Robuste, vielseitige Leistung für mehrere Anwender – dank integrierter Netzwerktechnologie.
• Mehrere Anwender können moderne Scan-Tools gemeinsam nutzen – der Scanner muss nur an ein Ethernet-Netzwerk angeschlossen werden. IT-Know-how ist nicht erforderlich. Problemloses Verteilen und Versenden digitaler Dateien über den PC direkt vom Scanner aus. Optionale PIN-Sicherheit. ISIS®-, TWAIN- und WIA-Treiber.

Dank autom. Dokumentenzuführung mit Duplexfunktion werden auch mehrseitige Dokumente schnell und zuverlässig gescannt.
• Höhere Produktivität im Büro: Dokumente werden automatisch erfasst. Autom. Dokumentenzuführung bietet Platz für bis zu 50 Blatt. Scangeschwindigkeit: bis zu 15 S./Min. oder 6 Bilder/Min. Visitenkarten, geheftete Dokumente, Fotos und Kleinbilddias/Negative können mithilfe des Flachbettscanners verarbeitet werden.

Benutzerfreundliche Kurzbefehle und automatische Bildoptimierung für noch effektiveres Scannen.
• Eine aufgabenbasierte Benutzeroberfläche und Direkttasten für Scannen und Kopieren verbessern die Effizienz1. Für Alltagsaufgaben (z. B. Scannen in PDF) lassen sich Kurzbefehle festlegen. Automatisches Begradigen, Zuschneiden, Drehen und Color-Dropout für noch präzisere OCR.

1 Gescannte Bilder lassen sich über den vorhandenen Standarddrucker ausgeben
description-en_US-print:
Overview
Enhance workteam or office productivity – share a range of advanced document capture tools over your wired Ethernet network. Automatically scan multi-page documents – single or double-sided – and share to networked folders or via email.

Features
Share robust, versatile performance across multiple users via integrated networking.
• Share advanced scanning tools between multiple users – just connect to an existing Ethernet network, no IT expertise necessary. Easy sharing and sending of digital files direct from the scanner. Optional PIN security. ISIS®, TWAIN and WIA drivers.

Scan multi-page documents quickly and reliably with the duplex automatic document feeder.
• Boost office productivity with unattended document capture. Load up to 50-sheets into the automatic document feeder and scan at up to 15 ppm/6 ipm. Handle business cards, stapled documents, photos and slides/negatives using the flatbed scanner.

Streamline your scanning processes with easy shortcuts and automatic image enhancement.
• Improve efficiency with a task-based user interface and one-touch ‘scan’ and ‘copy’1 buttons. Set shortcuts to common tasks such as scan-to-PDF. Automatically deskew, crop and rotate, and choose colour drop-out to improve OCR accuracy.

1 Print a copy of a scanned image to an existing default printer
description-fr_FR-print:
Overview
Améliorez le travail en équipe ou la productivité au bureau : partagez un éventail d'outils de capture de documents avancés sur votre réseau Ethernet filaire. Numérisez automatiquement des documents de plusieurs pages (recto ou recto verso) et partagez-les sur des dossiers en réseau ou par e-mail.

Features
Partagez des performances solides et polyvalentes entre plusieurs utilisateurs grâce à la fonction réseau intégrée.
• Partagez des outils de numérisation avancés entre plusieurs utilisateurs : il suffit de vous connecter à un réseau Ethernet existant, aucune expertise informatique n'est nécessaire. Partage et envoi aisés de fichiers numériques directement à partir du scanner. Sécurité avec PIN en option. Pilotes ISIS®, TWAIN et WIA.

Numérisez des documents de plusieurs pages de façon rapide et fiable avec le chargeur automatique de documents recto verso.
• Augmentez la productivité au bureau avec la capture de document sans surveillance. Chargez jusqu'à 50 feuilles dans le chargeur automatique de documents et numérisez à une vitesse pouvant atteindre 15 ppm/6 ipm. Traitez les cartes de visite, les documents agrafés, les photos et les diapositives/négatifs sur le scanner à plat.

Rationalisez vos processus de numérisation avec des raccourcis et l'amélioration automatique d'image.
• Améliorez l'efficacité avec une interface utilisateur reposant sur des tâches et des boutons de numérisation et copie1. Définissez des raccourcis vers des tâches courantes telles que la numérisation vers PDF. Réalisez automatiquement la correction d'alignement, le rognage et la rotation, et choisissez le détourage de couleur pour améliorer la précision de reconnaissance des caractères.

1 Imprimez une copie d'une image numérisée sur une imprimante par défaut existante

name: Samsung UE40EH6030W
description-en_US-print: Samsung UE40EH6030W. HD type: Full HD, Display resolution: 1920 x 1080, Aspect ratio: 16:9. Tuner type: Analogue & Digital, Digital signal format system: DVB-C, DVB-T. Audio system: SRS TheaterSound HD. Video formats supported: DIVX, Audio formats supported: MP3, Image formats supported: JPG. Power consumption (standby): 0.5, Energy efficiency class: A, Input voltage: 220 - 240

name: Canon imageRUNNER 2420
description-de_DE-print: Kompakte, kosteneffiziente Schwarzweißkopierer mit lokalen Druckfunktionen Diese neue Serie Platz sparender Kopierer ermöglicht hochwertige Schwarzweißkopien sowie lokalen USB-Druck. Als produktive Lösung mit niedrigen Betriebskosten eignen sie sich besonders für kleine Arbeitsgruppen mit hohem Arbeitsaufkommen. Werden Sie produktiver Dank des einfach zu bedienenden und intuitiven LC-Displays mit 5 Zeilen und Hintergrundbeleuchtung können Benutzer mehr Arbeit in kürzerer Zeit erledigen. Aufgrund seiner Ausgabegeschwindigkeit von 20 A4-Seiten pro Minute in erstklassiger Qualität und seiner herausragenden Reaktionszeit – Ausgabe der ersten Seite nach nur 7,9 Sekunden – können Sie mit dem imageRUNNER 2420 viel Zeit einsparen. Nach Ihren Anforderungen skalierbar Diese kompakten Modelle können auch für große Herausforderungen konfiguriert werden. Sie können das System mit zusätzlichen Papierfächern erweitern und so die beste Kapazität für Ihre Ansprüche selbst bestimmen. Das System fasst bis zu 1.080 Blatt und Papierformate bis A3. Zu den weiteren Optionen zählen Netzwerkscan und Netzwerkdruck, doppelseitige Drucke und Heftung. Welche Anforderungen Sie also auch immer haben, mit diesen Kompaktgeräten können Sie auf professionelle Leistung und überragende Ergebnisse vertrauen. Ausgezeichnete Zuverlässigkeit und unübertroffener Support Die verbesserte Lebensdauer und Betriebsfähigkeit garantieren dauerhaft hochwertige Ausdrucke und ein sorgloses Arbeiten. Nutzen Sie das herausragende Service- und Supportangebot von Canon mit fachkundiger Installation, Schulung und Vor-Ort-Service sowie festgelegten SLAs (Service Level Agreements). Über die Abrechnung per Klick zahlen Sie nur für tatsächlich gedruckte Seiten, sodass Sie immer die volle Kontrolle über Ihre Kosten haben. Herausragender Kundenservice von A bis Z ist unsere oberste Priorität, daher sind 93 %* unserer Kunden mit der Reparaturzeit für ihre Bürosysteme zufrieden. Geringere Umweltbelastung Diese ENERGY STAR®-Modelle bieten eine beeindruckende Energieeffizienz mit einem Energieverbrauch von nur 4,5 Watt im Schlaf-Modus. Damit sparen Sie Energie und Kosten. Die Fixier-Technologie ohne Vorwärmzeiten von Canon ermöglicht ein sofortiges Aufwärmen aus dem Ruhezustand, sodass die Produktivität von den Energiesparfunktionen nicht beeinträchtigt wird. * Laut einer Umfrage zur Servicezufriedenheit von TNS NIPO. Stand der Daten: Januar bis Juli 2009. An der Umfrage nahmen 16.059 Kunden teil. Die Abbildung oben zeigt das Gerät mit optionalen Papierkassetten.
description-en_US-print: Compact, cost-effective black and white copiers with local printing The new space-saving range of copiers provides highly efficient copying plus local printing via USB.
